attributes.action: allow the Red Arrows to carry out a display at 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Red Arrows represent the best of British technology, using a British made aircraft in the Hawk and their expertise in the field of aerial display is second to none.  They should certainly be allowed to do their display at the British Olympics.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
